amendatorysection.para: For the protection of the livestock industry in Nebraska and to aid in achieving the purposes of the Pseudorabies Control and Eradication Act, the department shall regulate the sale and use of pseudorabies vaccine. The department may restrict the sale and use of pseudorabies vaccine and when deemed appropriate by the department may require the use of pseudorabies vaccine. The department shall require detailed record keeping and reporting by persons involved in the sale or use, or both, of such vaccine.
